# Credentials format

## Algoritmhia

File:`key.json`

```
{
	"apiKey": "aDWOIDJAOIJWDOIAJOIAJDOIAJD+s1"
}
```

## IBM Watson UNL

File: `watson.json`

```
{
  "apikey": "djapowdjwapojdapwojdawpjdpadwdw dwdjpoawjdpo-K",
  "iam_apikey_description": "Auto generated apikey during resource-key operation for Instance - crn:v1:bluemix:public:natural-language-understanding:us-south:a/1a09a6aae57f4a8ca3551bf3a1112e1c:8c341a01-0ed5-42e3-ae96-da9336829d26::",
  "iam_apikey_name": "auto-generated-apikey-156cf7cb-e9a8-4077-8eac-86b5db65e58b",
  "iam_role_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam::::serviceRole:Manager",
  "iam_serviceid_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam-identity::a/1a09a6aae57f4a8ca3551bf3a1112e1c::serviceid:ServiceId-6388c679-c0e7-4c05-97c2-111e5afb7827",
  "url": "https://gateway.watsonplatform.net/natural-language-understanding/api"
}
``
